Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 3 lines of Greek. A receipt for a dike tax.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (Excavation note 'F top rubbish' has been written on the inner surface)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392592) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392592)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.3; 87-88)
